title: 50Mb Internet Connection Included, On-Site Maintenance
posting_body: ['The Lydian', '2590 Welton St, Denver, CO, 80205', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 72', 'OR Text', '72', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'The Lydian is about style and individuality.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 605 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Although there's much to do within the steps of The Lydian, you may be tempted to stay home to enjoy your artfully appointed home surrounded by community conveniences - from coffee and co-working, to fitness and fire pits -", 'The Lydian is about style and individuality.', 'Features', '- Modern Plank Flooring', '- Large Walk-in Showers', '- Disposal', '- Energy Star Rated Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Low Profile Carpet', '- Expansive Walk-in Closets', '- White Quartz Countertops', '- Front Load Washer & Dryer', '- Electronic Thermostat', '- 50Mb Internet Connection Included', '- Energy Efficient AC and Heating', '- Gourmet Kitchens with 42" Tall Cabinets', '- Dishwasher', '- Spacious Islands with Pendant Lighting', '- Soaking Bathtubs', '- European Roller Shades', '- Large Patios with Views!', '- Large Picture Windows', 'Community Amenities', '- Rooftop Pool & Lounge', '- Convenient Underground Parking', '- Luxurious Resident Lounge', '- Health Club Quality Fitness Center', '- On-Site Management', '- Recycling', '- Elevator', '- Onsite Yoga and Group Fitness Classes', '- 83 Walk Score & 98 Bike Score!', '- Outdoor Firepit & Gas Grills', '- Sweeping Mountain and Downtown Views', '- High Speed Internet Included', '- Light Rail Stop at Your Door', '- Controlled Building Access', '- On-Site Maintenance', '- Availability 24 Hours', '- Premium Package Handling', '- Bike Storage', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 12:00PM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Max 2 pets per apartment, Max weight 80 lb each, One-time Pet Fee $500.00, Rent $50.00 per month', 'Breed Restrictions: Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Bull Mastiffs, Chows, Doberman Pinschers, German Shepherds, Pit Bulls, Presa Canarios, Rottweilers, Shar Peis, Siberian Huskies, Staffordshire Terriers, Wolf Hybrids or any variation or mixes of these breeds.', '1Bedst1Cs']
